name: MKDirections.ETAResponse
desc: The travel-time information returned by Apple servers.

items.name: var source: MKMapItem
items.desc: The start point of the route.

items.name: var destination: MKMapItem
items.desc: The end point of the route.

items.name: var expectedTravelTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The expected travel time in seconds.

items.name: var distance: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The expected travel distance, in meters.

items.name: var transportType: MKDirectionsTransportType
items.desc: The type of conveyance used to determine the travel time.
